sourcesContent:
Curso {{ courses.name }} Name {{ course.category }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Course } from '../model/course'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.scss'] }) export class CoursesComponent { //Criando o dataSource //course: interface criada //Pra iniciar pode ser com o construtor ou courses: Course[] = [] //Ou constructor() { // this.courses = [] // } courses: Course[] = []; displayedColumns = ["name", "category"] }
